bridge.Description: A gateway connecting one network to another.

dydx.Description: dYdX: A standard for decentralized margin trading and derivatives

layer-2.Description: Layer 2 refers to several approaches to handle transactions off the main Ethereum chain. These allow for higher scalability of the network and reduced transaction fees. Examples include Optimistic and Zero-Knowledge (ZK) Rollups, Validium, Plasma and State Channels.
